Low season, sunny winter days, fewer crowds, comfortable temperatures (6-12°C)
Mild Mediterranean winter, almond trees blooming, pleasant temperatures (7-14°C)
Famous carnival with parades, flower battles, and festivities, increased tourism, book ahead
Final carnival celebrations, still busy but manageable

Beautiful weather, not yet crowded, perfect temperatures (15-22°C), outdoor activities

Famous car race in neighboring Monaco, increased tourism, luxury atmosphere
Perfect beach weather (18-24°C), increasing tourism, long days, outdoor activities

Pleasant autumn weather, swimming still possible, comfortable temperatures (15-22°C)

Mild autumn, quieter city atmosphere, pleasant temperatures (9-16°C)

scoreDescription.5: Excellent: Perfect conditions, special events, ideal weather, moderate crowds, best value
scoreDescription.4: Good: Very favorable conditions, pleasant weather, manageable crowds, good value
scoreDescription.3: Average: Standard conditions, typical weather, moderate to high tourism, fair value
scoreDescription.2: Below Average: Less ideal conditions due to excessive crowds or occasional rain, limited value
scoreDescription.1: Poor: Unfavorable conditions, extreme weather, overcrowded or limited activities, poor value

weatherNotes.spring: Mild Mediterranean climate, pleasant temperatures, occasional rain, perfect for outdoor activities
weatherNotes.summer: Hot and dry, excellent beach weather, occasional heatwaves, evening sea breezes
weatherNotes.autumn: Gradually cooling, beautiful light, comfortable for walking, occasional rain
weatherNotes.winter: Mild Mediterranean winter, rarely cold, sunny days, perfect for winter sun

transportation.tram: Efficient year-round, air-conditioned, connects major attractions
transportation.walking: Excellent year-round, especially along Promenade des Anglais
transportation.cycling: Great in spring and autumn, dedicated bike lanes, scenic coastal routes
transportation.boats: Scenic year-round, trips to nearby islands and coastal towns

accommodation.advanceBooking: Recommended 3-6 months ahead for peak season, especially during festivals
